definition: Rhone, river of Switzerland and France
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
Rhone, river of Switzerland and France

sentences.english: We should take Ronaldo to Lourdes.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該帶羅納爾多去盧爾德。

sentences.english: Ronaldo camped on the left-wing to battle with Ferreira.
sentences.chinese: 羅納爾多打左邊鋒，對壘費雷拉。

sentences.english: Ronald confused Denton again with his serve.
sentences.chinese: 羅納德的發球又一次使丹頓不知所措。

sentences.english: Ronald and I were among the last of the 1995 Ajax team.
sentences.chinese: 羅納德和我是1995年那支阿賈克斯隊中最後走的。

sentences.english: The only president not to parade down Pennsylvania Avenue was Ronald Reagan.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的總統不跌賓夕法尼亞大道的遊行是羅納德里根。

sentences.english: I've played against Giggsy, Ronaldo and Nani.
sentences.chinese: 我曾經碰到過吉格斯，羅納爾多和納尼。

sentences.english: Lester is accused of fatally shooting 36-year-old Ronald E.
sentences.chinese: 萊斯特被控射殺36歲的羅納德東施拉特。
伊斯克羅斯，維羅納親王。

sentences.english: Ozil also served an assist to Ronaldo against Atletico Madrid in the Copa del Rey.
sentences.chinese: 厄齊爾同樣在國王杯對陣馬德里競技時助工羅納爾多。

sentences.english: On the eastern bank of the Rhône River in southeastern France lies the city of Avignon.
sentences.chinese: 阿維尼翁城，矗立在法國東南部羅納河的東岸。

sentences.english: He was born in Verona and received early music education there.
sentences.chinese: 他出生在維羅納和接受早期音樂教育狀況。

sentences.english: I picked Ronny because he scored a hatful of goals and so many were important.
sentences.chinese: 我會選羅納爾多，因爲他進了太多球，這很重要。

sentences.english: Q. In refusing to select Ronaldinho, is Dunga being wise or just stubborn?
sentences.chinese: 不帶羅納爾迪尼奧去南非，鄧加是英明呢還是頑固呢？

sentences.english: That Ronaldo is utterly essential to Real’s chances is unquestionable.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，羅納爾多對皇馬是不可或缺的。

sentences.english: Owing to his fantastic performance, Ronaldo got the call-up to the full Brazil national squad.
sentences.chinese: 由於羅納爾多的出色表現，他被選入巴西國家足球對。

sentences.english: There's only one Ronaldo, and he is called Christiano.
sentences.chinese: 世上只有一個羅納爾多，他的名字叫做克里斯蒂亞諾。

definition: the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
Kohl (name)/Helmut Kohl (1930-2017), German CDU politician, Chancellor 1982-1998
Ur (Sumerian city c. 4500 BC in modern Iraq)
Dole (name)/Bob Dole (1923-), US Republican politician, Kansas senator 1969-1996
